name: Visualized Hunger Games
description:
This is a simulation project made for IGME 330: Rich Media Web Application Development I. The focus of the project was to make a visual-intense program using what we learned about the Canvas API and web development.

I worked on most of the back-end JavaScript programming for this project, including the combat simulation and the canvas drawing. I also helped with some of the HTML and CSS.

Made by: Alessandro Fiorella and Tommy Delp

*If you want to try out the simulator for yourself, please it the "Download" button; it will open up the program in a new tab.
